about_the_game:
This OST contains the complete soundtrack within the game ANNO: Mutationem.

The soundtrack of ANNO: Mutationem was created by Haloweakm, the music director of Vanguard Sound, who led a number of music producers to create future-filled, cyberpunk-inspired electronic music and a variety of diverse music integrated into the game's worldview; GhostFinal, also from Vanguard Sound, led a number of sound designers and audio programs to complete the game's entire sound design.
